item.title: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage
item.description:
Title: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage
Genre: Adventure , Indie
Developer: DON'T NOD
Publisher: DON'T NOD
Franchise: DON'T NOD
Release Date: Feb 18, 2025




About This Game

Rewind back to the 90s and live the defining summer of four high school girls as they forge bonds through their growing friendship, their punk band, and an unexplained event that will forever change their lives.

Experience the story in two thrilling parts! Tape 1, "Bloom", launches February 18 and Tape 2, "Rage", launches April 15. ‚ÄúRage‚Äù will become available as a free downloadable update when it is released.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains explicit language, casual homophobia, weight and body image issues, sexual content, illness and discussion of illness, blood, domestic violence, flashing lights, and sudden loud sounds.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-2700K or AMD FX-8350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 560, 4GB or Intel ARC A380, 6GB
    • Storage: 48 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400 or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080, 10 GB or AMD RX 6800XT, 16GB
    • Storage: 48 GB available space

item.title: Tiny Pasture
item.description:
Title: Tiny Pasture
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: CaveLiquid
Publisher: CaveLiquid
Release Date: Feb 17, 2025




About This Game

Tiny Pasture is your charming little farm simulator that cozies up at the bottom of your screen, keeping you company while you work or study. In this game, you can buy adorable baby animals, grow them, and collect coins dropped from them once they‚Äôre all grown up to rake in some sweet profits and expand your pasture. When you improve yourself and have fun, your little critters will grow with you.

Unlock New Species

Rabbits, foxes, alpacas, birds... and even slimes and zombies? Before long, you'll have an entire animal army!

Get Interactive with Your Animals

Feed them, click on them, and watch them grow happily! You can also click on them with the middle mouse button to make them follow your cursor around!

Raise a New Life

Place the Mystery Curtain in the Pasture and choose two adult animals of the same species. After a while, they'll breed and bring forth newborn animals!

Magic Pasture

Purchase and deploy magical facilities to help you keep your animals clean and healthy!

Other features

Freely drag and adjust the length of the pasture. Place it anywhere on your screen!

üñäÔ∏èGame FAQ

Q: I usually hide my taskbar, but after running the game, it's gone!

A: Just press the Win key on your keyboard after running the game, and the taskbar will reappear.

Q: Why is the background behind my animals black when I open the game?

A: Please click on "View Discussions" on the store page; we've pinned a solution for the black screen issue there!

Q: Whenever Steam pops up a notification, the Pasture screen tears!

A: You can go to your library, right-click on our game, go to properties, general, and turn off "Enable Steam Overlay while in-game". This option will only affect our game and won't impact other games!

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i3 Dual Core
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 500 MB available space

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
    • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core i3
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
    • Storage: 512 MB available space

item.title: SN√ò: Ultimate Freeriding
item.description:
Title: SN√ò: Ultimate Freeriding
Genre: Indie , Racing , Simulation , Sports
Developer: Studio Gauntlet
Publisher: Studio Gauntlet
Release Date: Feb 17, 2025




About This Game

SN√ò is a game about downhill skiing where you carve your way down various mountainscapes trying to score as many points as possible by pulling off high risk maneuvers and tricks. Go for the high score or simply flow through serene, arctic landscapes. The controls are easy to learn, and there are endless procedural mountains to explore.

SN√ò is made in Norway by two people. With SN√ò we have tried to capture the essence of downhill skiing the only way we know how: In a minimalistic, no-nonsense way - focusing on rewarding gameplay systems, smooth controls and sleek visuals. SN√ò is perfect for short play sessions (though they tend to get longer than one anticipates), or when you simply feel like zoning out for a while.

Hearing from you makes our day! If you have questions or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out on any of our socials or leave a review.

Special message to all Steamdeck users:

We have optimized SN√ò for the Steamdeck. The game runs at 60 FPS on High quality settings. Enjoy.

Things you will find in this game

  • Fast and smooth skiing gameplay

  • Endless procedurally generated mountains

  • Share mountains with the seed based mountain generator

  • Countless skins requiring skills to unlock

  • Full keyboard and gamepad support

  • Optional Zen-mode - No scoring, just you and the mountain

  • Online global and friends leaderboards

  • Visit top scoring mountains directly from the leaderboard

  • First person, third person and drone camera modes

  • Dynamic action cam mode

  • Photo mode

Things you will not find

  • Online multiplayer

  • Prepped slopes

  • Loading times

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Cinema Simulator 2025
item.description:
Title: Cinema Simulator 2025
Genre: Simulation , Early Access
Developer: HOGO Games
Publisher: HOGO Games
Release Date: Feb 17, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Feb 17, 2025




About This Game

Manage the Cinema Schedule!

Get to know your audience well and showcase hit movies at the right times! Plan the showtimes carefully to fill your halls and increase customer satisfaction. It's up to you to choose which movies to release each week; set your strategy wisely!

Maintain Order!

There may be those who want to disrupt the peace in the cinema hall! Detect and intervene with smokers and those secretly recording films. Be quick, or other customers may leave due to dissatisfaction. Keep order by slapping and ensure all customers are happy!

Popcorn & Drink Service

No cinema experience is complete without warm popcorn and cold drinks! Increase customer satisfaction by offering the tastiest snacks. Remember, every service takes you a step ahead!

Build Your Team, Achieve Success!

Managing the cinema empire alone can be tough. Hire and grow your team to enhance customer satisfaction. The right employees will elevate your service quality to the top!

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Some of the visuals in the game (movie posters, and some movies) were created using artificial intelligence.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
    • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
    • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 16 GB available space

item.title: NO-SKIN
item.description:
Title: NO-SKIN
Genre: Indie , RPG
Developer: NoEye-Soft
Publisher: NoEye-Soft
Release Date: Feb 16, 2025




About This Game

NO-SKIN is a roguelike game characterized by a horror atmosphere and a smooth yet complex gameplay. Face the horrors that the house hides behind every corner and discover who the No-Skin Man truly is!

FEATURES

  • Unique art style: photos in the background combined with hand-drawn pixel art characters
  • High replayability: play with different characters, unlock new content between runs, and experience different outcomes from each playthrough
  • Horror atmosphere: immerse yourself completely in the unsettling and surreal atmosphere of this game....

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Disturbing images, violence, gore, themes of suicide. Use of alcohol, drugs and cigarettes.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 64 bit
    • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 100 MB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
